/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a concrete median, is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. In the distance, power lines stretch across the sky, adding an urban touch to the landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The overall composition of the image provides a comprehensive view of a typical day on a busy street in Beijing.
